forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West wind around 18 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 51. West wind 8 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
As the afternoon unfolds in downtown San Francisco, sunshine bathes the city in a warm glow, with temperatures settling around a pleasant 70 degrees. A gentle westward breeze whispers through the streets, occasionally picking up its pace to send a few loose leaves dancing. The atmosphere feels refreshingly clear, presenting an inviting opportunity for those yearning to embrace the outdoors. The landscape stretches down to the Golden Gate, showcasing the beauty of the bay, unfettered by any fog or marine layer that might threaten earlier in the day. 

As evening approaches, the scene is set to remain mostly clear, with a low temperature resting around 51 degrees. Those venturing out might appreciate a light jacket to ward off the evening chill, as the wind could still find ways to create a crisp contrast against the warmth of the day. With such favorable conditions, a stroll along the waterfront or a casual visit to the nearby parks could turn into a tranquil escape. Perhaps a stop at a local café for a warm beverage would perfectly cap off the day, making the most of this serene urban environment before the onset of night.
